name: io.github.jwgale/sanctum
title: SanctumAI — Credential Vault for AI Agents
description: Credential vault for AI agents — encrypted storage, lease-based access, CRP support.

environmentVariables.name: SANCTUM_VAULT_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Path to the SanctumAI vault directory. Defaults to ~/.sanctum

environmentVariables.name: SANCTUM_PASSPHRASE
environmentVariables.description: Vault passphrase for automated/headless operation. If not set, the vault must be unlocked interactively or via the web UI.
